text: Raoping County (postal: Jaoping; ) is a county in eastern Guangdong Province, bordering Fujian Province to the east, and facing the South China Sea to the south. The city with the same name has 135,600 inhabitants (1990). It is under the jurisdiction of the prefecture-level city of Chaozhou. The dialects spoken in Raoping are Teochew and Hakka (Raoping dialect). Raoping is famous for its seafood and fruits. ==Climate== ==Famous people== * Zhang Jingsheng (Sexologist) ==See also== * Chaoshan ==External links== *Official website of Raoping County Government Category:County-level divisions of Guangdong
title: Raoping County
